title: Project-Based Mathematics Curriculum for Internationalized Blended and Virtual Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic skills and practical application of everyday mathematics
context.additional_context: Blended learning program in international collaborative settings with smartphone-based constrained technology conditions, focusing on enhancing math competencies linked to professionals' job roles

learning_goals: Learners can improve mathematical problem-solving skills to an accuracy of 80% or higher through project assignments based on real-world work scenarios.
Learners can complete project deliverables collaboratively with three or more international teams using a virtual collaboration platform.
Learners can create a self-directed learning plan based on Self-Determination Theory and implement it with a compliance rate of 90% or higher.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
